attributes.action: Commission a public enquiry into the science of climate change, taking account of recent release of CRU, Giss, and Noaa emails.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister. 

Please be aware that this request is now on public record. 

If you chose to ignore it, and chose to enter into any legal obligation at the Copenhagen climate conference, that is not supported by UK citizens, you will be held to account.

An open and public enquiry concerning this global issue is now essential.

You must commission the necessary public enquiry without delay.

Rejection of this petition request will be publicized, widely.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
